name: Night Job : Choice Driven RPG
blurb: Night Job is a story centric RPG that is driven by the choices you make. It features JRPG style gameplay & animated cutscenes!

rewards.reward: No Reward

Your support is greatly appreciated! Thanks to you we're able to work harder on making this game great. You will receive a digital "thank you" wallpaper, hand signed with a WACOM tablet. Your name will also appear on the backers page of our website.

Early Bird Special! Choose to back us early and receive a digital download of Night Job.\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou will also receive a signed digital "thank you" wallpaper, and your name will appear on the backers page of our website.

Receive a digital download of Night Job!\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou will also receive a signed digital "thank you" wallpaper, in addition to your name appearing on the backers page of our website.

You gain BETA access to Night Job.\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou will also receive a digital copy of the game, a signed digital "thank you" wallpaper, and your name will appear on the backers page of our website.

Receive 2 downloads of Night Job, one for a friend! You will have BETA access for yourself alone.\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll also receive a signed digital "thank you" wallpaper, in addition to your name appearing on the backers page of our website.

Receive the digital soundtrack for Night Job!\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll also receive 2 digital downloads, 1 BETA access, a signed digital "thank you" wallpaper and your name appearing on the backers page of our website.

Have your name appear on a tombstone in game!\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll also receive 2 digital downloads, the digital soundtrack, 1 BETA access, a signed digital "thank you" wallpaper and your name appearing on the backers page of our website.

Your name will appear on a tombstone in game and it will include an epitaph you created! Try to keep it to 7 words or less and it's subject to approval.\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll also receive 2 digital downloads, the digital soundtrack, 1 BETA access, a signed digital "thank you" wallpaper and your name appearing on the backers page of our website.

Your name will appear in an especially creepy place in our game that includes more details decided by you! The text is subject to approval. -------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll also receive 2 digital downloads, the digital soundtrack, 1 BETA access, a signed digital "thank you" wallpaper and your name appearing on the backers page of our website.

Be an NPC! You will have your likeness put into the game as a character. You will decide the appearance and colors of your character within the limits of the game.\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll also receive 2 digital downloads, the digital soundtrack, 1 BETA access, a signed digital "thank you" wallpaper and your name appearing on the backers page of our website.

Be an in-game NPC and decide what your character says! You will decide the appearance and colors of your character within the limits of the game and the text is subject to approval.\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll also receive 2 digital downloads, the digital soundtrack, 1 BETA access, a signed digital "thank you" wallpaper and your name appearing on the backers page of our website.

Be an in game NPC, choose what you say, and help us create the sound your character make when it interacts!\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll also receive 2 digital downloads, the digital soundtrack, 1 BETA access, a signed digital "thank you" wallpaper and your name appearing on the backers page of our website.

Receive a T-shirt featuring game artwork!\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll also create your own in-game NPC, receive 2 digital downloads, the digital soundtrack, 1 BETA access, a signed digital "thank you" wallpaper and your name appearing on the backers page of our website.

Receive a poster featuring game artwork!\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll also create your own in-game NPC, receive 2 digital downloads, the digital soundtrack, 1 BETA access, a signed digital "thank you" wallpaper and your name appearing on the backers page of our website.

Receive the game poster and T-shirt!\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll also create your own in-game NPC, receive 2 digital downloads, the digital soundtrack, 1 BETA access, a signed digital "thank you" wallpaper and your name appearing on the backers page of our website.

Be an even more important in-game NPC complete with dialogue choices for the player! You will decide the choices and reactions in addition to creating the character.\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll receive the game poster, game T-shirt, 2 digital downloads, the digital soundtrack, 1 BETA access, a signed digital "thank you" wallpaper and your name appearing on the backers page of our website.

Create your own in-game NPC that will appear near a pivotal point in the game. Choose to be a friend or foe of the main character! Will you decide to help or hurt with your dialogue choices? Your decision could change the mind of the main character!\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll receive the game poster, game T-shirt, 2 digital downloads, the digital soundtrack, 1 BETA access, a signed digital "thank you" wallpaper and your name appearing on the backers page of our website.

You will create your own in-game key item. Decide what it is, what it looks like, and what to name it! You will also be able to create an NPC related to the item.\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll receive the game poster, game T-shirt, 2 digital downloads, the digital soundtrack, 1 BETA access, a signed digital "thank you" wallpaper and your name appearing on the backers page of our website.

Have your character appear in an animated cutscene! You will create your character and also have its likeness drawn into a game cutscene.\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll receive the game poster, game T-shirt, 2 digital downloads, the digital soundtrack, 1 BETA access, a signed digital "thank you" wallpaper and your name appearing on the backers page of our website.

We will create a save point in the game that is centered around your ideas. You will have input on how it's decorated, the layout, and you can populate it with your own NPC. Any dialogue included is decided by you.\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll receive the game poster, game T-shirt, 2 digital downloads, the digital soundtrack, 1 BETA access, a signed digital "thank you" wallpaper and your name appearing on the backers page of our website.

We will work with you to develop your own secret area to appear in Night Job! You will have input on the design, layout, and you can populate it with your own NPC and items. Any dialogue included is decided by you.\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll receive the game poster, game T-shirt, 2 digital downloads, the digital soundtrack, 1 BETA access, a signed digital "thank you" wallpaper and your name appearing on the backers page of our website.

We will work with you to develop your own event! You will have input on the appearance, strategy, design, NPC character and dialogue. We'll help you make a very cool portion of the game, think of it as a mini boss!\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll receive the game poster, game T-shirt, 2 digital downloads, the digital soundtrack, 1 BETA access, a signed digital "thank you" wallpaper and your name appearing on the backers page of our website.

We will work with you to create an in-game NPC that will provide choices to the player that will effect game progression. You will help create the NPC, the dialogue, and the outcomes of the player's choices. You will decide risk & reward.\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll receive the game poster, game T-shirt, 2 digital downloads, the digital soundtrack, 1 BETA access, a signed digital "thank you" wallpaper and your name appearing on the backers page of our website.

You will be featured in the game as a major reoccurring NPC. You will decide the look of the character and have input on all the dialogue choices. You'll be featured in appropriate cutscenes and will really be able to inject your personality into your NPC. You'll also be listed in the game credits as a Producer.\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll receive the game poster, game T-shirt, 2 digital downloads, the digital soundtrack, 1 BETA access, a signed digital "thank you" wallpaper and your name appearing on the backers page of our website.

You will help us develop a major in-game boss. You will have input on the entire encounter including design, layout, and dialogue. You will have your own cutscene and have a huge impact on the game. You will also be listed as an Executive Producer in the game credits.\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll receive the game poster, game T-shirt, 2 digital downloads, the digital soundtrack, 1 BETA access, a signed digital "thank you" wallpaper and your name appearing on the backers page of our website.
